verses.name: Acts 23:5
verses.text: Then said Paul, I wist not, brethren, that he was the high priest: for it is written, Thou shalt not speak evil of the ruler of thy people.

verses.name: Acts 23:6
verses.text: But when Paul perceived that the one part were Sadducees, and the other Pharisees, he cried out in the council, Men and brethren, I am a Pharisee, the son of a Pharisee: of the hope and resurrection of the dead I am called in question.

verses.name: Acts 23:7
verses.text: And when he had so said, there arose a dissension between the Pharisees and the Sadducees: and the multitude was divided.
